originalText.text: I had two surgeries at once with Dr. Weiss years ago and I can honestly say that I trust him with my body.  He is a loving and caring doctor and so is his  staff.  I in fact plan to see him again for another procedure. Thank you Dr. Weiss for who you are and your wonderful technique in surgeries. I have recommended my family members to him because he is just Awesome....

originalText.text: Can't say enough positive things about Dr. Weiss and his staff. I am extremely happy with my surgery results and this man changed my life in the best way possible. He is a true advocate and an excellent surgeon.

text.text: Can't say enough positive things about Dr. Weiss and his staff. I am extremely happy with my surgery results and this man changed my life in the best way possible. He is a true advocate and an excellent surgeon.

originalText.text:
I saw Dr. Weiss for a consult. I was able to get an appt within a week, staff was friendly.

Can’t lie his office is a bit on the gloomy/dark side. Just outdated.

Dr. Weiss is very nice but he definitely leans on the side of caution. He tells you what he does and what he would do for his daughter, but I wasn’t sure if he was really understanding what I was asking for. His fees was about 10% less than the other doctors within the area.

originalText.text: Best Experience ever vey hands on He takes Huge pride into his work I Lost over 75 Pounds Dr., Weis Gave me A Tummy Tuck The insencions were made perfectly in my bikini area. Prior to metting Dr Weis A Doctor named Dr Morrison Plastic Surgent in harlem hospital  was suppose to reconstuct my breast and cut dog ears from  my prior breast Reduction with him He left my breast Deformed   bruised and Scared  and  dog ears where still attached  I Went to doctor weis an he didnt want me to risk loosing a nipple however he contoured my breast so perfectly i wish i would have met him sooner.  I am truly satisfied with his work
